entry.title: 6-in-1 Smart LED Table Lamp with Bluetooth Speaker, Wireless Charger & Ambient Night Light
entry.summary:
Vendor: My Store
Type: Phone Accessories
Price: 54.99 - 78.00 (12 variants)

Elevate your space with the 2024 6-in-1 Smart LED Table Lamp – a perfect blend of style and functionality. Enjoy customizable ambience, wireless charging, a night light, and Bluetooth speaker all in one sleek device. Luxury meets convenience for a sophisticated lifestyle..

Overview:

6-in-1 Smart LED Table Lamp with Wireless Charger & Bluetooth Speaker

Features:

  • 6-in-1 Multi-function Design: Combines 15W wireless fast charging, Bluetooth speaker, clock, alarm clock, temperature display, and 19 lighting modes – all with a sleek, modern look.
  • 15W Wireless Fast Charging: Effortlessly charge your phone and watch simultaneously by placing them on the charging pad – no cords needed.
  • High-Quality Bluetooth Speaker: One-click Bluetooth connection for immersive, crystal-clear audio.
  • Customizable Lighting: Switch between 19 light modes, from warm, soft lighting to vibrant RGB colors, perfect for any occasion.
  • Ideal Gift & Décor Piece: Comes with a Type-C charging cable and smart remote control, packed in a stylish gift box.

Product Info:

  • Colors: White, Black, Pink (with multiple PD head options for US, UK, EU).
  • Power: Total power 30W, output power 25W.
  • Note: Requires a 36W+ plug for optimal performance; remote control uses 2 AAA batteries (not included).
  • The device must support wireless charging, and the machine must be plugged in to operate.

Packing List:

1x Smart LED Table Lamp
1x Type-C Charging Cable
1x Smart Remote Control (without batteries)

entry.title: Retro wave vinyl player
entry.summary:
Vendor: IgnoTec
Type: Portable Audio & Video
Price: 44.99 - 49.99 (6 variants)

Overview:

Portable Retro Design:  The retro Bluetooth speaker only occupies 5.6*6*2.64 inches of space, which is very suitable for placing on the bedside, and can also be carried around to listen to music easily. Listen to vintage music while cooking outdoors, at parties, yard work, in the garage, at the campfire, hiking, biking, or at the beach.

4 Nature Sounds:  Bring the beautiful sounds of nature into the bedroom to improve the quality of sleep. The sounds of sea blue lapping on the shore, burning bonfires, insects and birds, and flowing streams.

Multiple Playback Methods:  Use the knob to adjust the playback mode, and the knob on the other side can adjust the volume, 360-degree surround sound, and play music through Bluetooth/AUX input/TF card/white noise.

Beautiful Breathing Light:  The transparent water ripple turntable can rotate with the music, creating a gorgeous atmosphere in the room. The screen-off design is not dazzling at night, and the screen can be woken up by tapping the body or vibrating the desktop.

 

Multi-scenario Application: Whether it is a party with many people or a bedroom at night, you can pair it with this Bluetooth speaker with ambient lighting. If you have questions about our products, please feel free to contact us.


Product information:
Power type: lithium battery
Color: blue, green
Frequency range: 100HZ-20KHZ
Additional features: voice prompts
Applicable scenario: family
Size: 142X153X67mm

5. Small and convenient, it is compatible with various devices, and support mobile phone, tablet, camera, notebook, etc
